meanings.sent1: Her unuttered thoughts remained hidden from everyone.
meanings.sent2: The unuttered agreement between them was understood without words.
meanings.sent3: His unuttered desire for ice cream was evident from the way he kept looking at the freezer.
meanings.sent4: The unuttered tension in the room could be felt by all present.
meanings.sent5: The unuttered pain in her eyes spoke volumes.

meanings.sent1: The unuttered emotions in his heart weighed heavily on him.
meanings.sent2: Her unuttered gratitude was evident in her warm smile.
meanings.sent3: The unuttered joy of winning the game made him jump with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The unuttered creativity in her mind was waiting to burst forth.
meanings.sent5: His unuttered fears held him back from taking risks.

meanings.sent1: The unuttered message in the letter was clear from the tear stains.
meanings.sent2: Their unuttered understanding of each other made their bond strong.
meanings.sent3: The unuttered plan to surprise her on her birthday was almost ruined.
meanings.sent4: The unuttered tension in the air made everyone uneasy.
meanings.sent5: His unuttered apology was conveyed through a heartfelt gesture.
